title: Quick-Fix
content:
That was a vague refrence to TF2, cause this is based on a source game and TF2 is a source game- anyway, fixed the Latest Update System. Instead of reading the Roblox Update System, which people cant, it now uses the Roblox's Mod Github Repository. This means it might not be updated for every update, I cant trust myself to do that, but at least it works. 

Work has been postponed quite a-bit recently with the combustion of my computer's PSU, still working on it but just on my laptop.
